bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. Combined Designation of feng 風 , wind, and han 寒， cold, resulting in a pathogenic evil qi including the characteristics of both . Su wen 素問 35: 瘧者，風寒之氣不常也 , “As for malaria, this is an irregular [presence] of the qi of wind and cold [in the body]”. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 refers to numerous pathological conditions associated with wind cold: feng han ke ni 風寒咳逆 , wind cold with cough and counterflow [of qi]; feng han shi bi 風寒濕痹 , wind cold with moisture blockage; feng han tou tong 風寒頭 痛 , wind cold with headache.
